title: Buffer design - pH of 7.5 given Ka and structure

content.question: The table above shows the values of Ka for four weak acids. Which of the following pairs of chemical species, when combined in equimolar amounts, results in a buffer with a pH closest to 7.5 ?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
